sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_EventScan.eoms
sqlquery.select: select pid id, handlemark eventid, operationname ruleids, duetime duetime, defaulthandlertype defaulttype, defaulthandlerid defaultid, handletype handletype, logrecord logrecord, eventbaseid baseid, baseschema baseschema from bs_t_wf_eventinstance where eventstatus = 0 and operationtype = 'SLA' order by createtime
